column2: 18.14.3 Fuel Management: Fuel Loading Main tanks 1 and 2 must be full?
column3: Fuel Loading Main tanks 1 and 2 must be full if center tank contains more than 1000 lbs.

column2: 18.14.3 Fuel Management: Intentional running of a center tank fuel pump (low pressure?
column3: Intentional running of a center tank fuel pump (low pressure light illuminated) is prohibited.
